show_name: Ah! My Goddess: Flights of Fancy (TV)
other_title: Ah! My Goddess: Everyone Has Wings
ああっ女神さまっ それぞれの翼 (Japanese)
plot: One year after goddess Belldandy emerged from Keiichi Morisato's mirror and promised to stay with him forever, a new threat to their happiness emerges, one that could end the contract between Belldandy and Keiichi.
opening_theme: "Shiawase no Iro" (幸せのいろ; "Color of Happiness") by Yoko Ishida
ending_theme: "Bokura no Kiseki" (僕らのキセキ; "Our Miracle") by Yoko Ishida (eps 01-11)
